thread.title: Kerala corporation to work on Sunday
thread.title_full: Kerala corporation to work on Sunday

author: IANS
title: Kerala corporation to work on Sunday
text: Moneylife Â» Kerala corporation to work on Sunday 42920 Kerala corporation to work on Sunday 0 Comments, Be the first to comment + COMMENT IANS | 28/07/2015 01:58 PM | The Kerala State Women's Development Corporation (KSWDC) will work on Sunday as mark of respect to former president A.P.J Abdul Kalam, the corporation said on Tuesday. "After discussing with our employees, we have decided to honour the former president's wish. We have decided to work on Sunday, August 2. All our offices in the state will work on Sunday," chairperson P. Khulsu said in a statement. Kalam passed away on Monday in Shillong.
